attributes.action: BBC to advertise & scrap the TV licence (Come on all vote for this one)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should the BBC get a meal ticket from the public? make it compete in the real world, in stead of going cap in hand to the government!We pay for digital then MADE BY LAW to have a receiver licence! SCRAP THE OLD FASHION OUT OF DATE LICENCE!!! Are we the only country to have one?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
